Weirder yet, if I specify specular both in SDF and in an ogre material, the final specular value appears to be the addition of the two, despite specular via SDF not showing at all if used alone. No other component appears to get added when specified in both SDF and an ogre material.

![specular_adds.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/824635858-specular_adds.png)

Maybe this addition behavior should be a separate bug.
